doc.previous: The city is also a landing point on three fiber optic cable systems linking the United States across the Pacific Ocean C2C Southern Cross Cable and VSNL Transpacific These cable landings lower energy costs and tax breaks led to a boom of data centers being built starting about 2010 86 Data centers include those for Adobe NetApp Umpqua Bank OHSU and Fortune Data Centers 86
doc.after: Hillsboro serves as the corporate headquarters for Rodgers Instruments Soloflex Norm Thompson Outfitters Eid Passport and Parr Lumber among others Fujitsu and NEC Corporation formerly had factories in Hillsboro 87
